meanings.sent1: The jacket had beautiful frogged details along the sleeves.
meanings.sent2: She wore a frogged dress to the party, and everyone admired its intricate design.
meanings.sent3: The frogged curtains in the living room added a touch of elegance to the cozy space.
meanings.sent4: Her frogged necklace shimmered in the sunlight, catching everyone's eye.
meanings.sent5: The frogged pillow on the couch was so soft and inviting.

meanings.sent1: The frogged toy had big eyes and a green color just like a real frog.
meanings.sent2: The pond was filled with frogged creatures hopping around happily.
meanings.sent3: The frogged cake at the party looked so realistic that it made everyone smile.
meanings.sent4: Her frogged backpack seemed to leap off her shoulders as she walked.
meanings.sent5: The frogged keychain croaked when squeezed, surprising everyone nearby.
